artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Don Wight; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Cotton velvet cloth printed with black outlined flowers in blues, turquoise, purple and browns on dark brown background. Cotton velvet cloth printed with darker outlined flowers in orange, red, turquoise, gold, pink and lavender on pale yellow speckled background. Speckles have different colors within each flower color. gold, pink, turquoise
